jokes.name: Deepa
jokes.joke: Gundoosi evlo olliya iruku, apram yen ellorum adha gundoosi nu soldranga..

jokes.name: Deepa
jokes.joke: While take-off we are calling Aeroplane, but while landing why we are not calling Erangoplane ?

jokes.name: Deepa
jokes.joke: Paal podravan paalkaran, paper podravan paper karan, pichai podravan pichakarana ?

jokes.name: Justin Juby
jokes.joke: Me: 'dei unne paathe udane, ennaku 404 error varudh ra :)' Friend:'enne da, page not found eh ?' Me: 'Illada, ...words not found!'

jokes.name: Sunil
jokes.joke:
Pal vali vantha palla pudungalam....Ana... Kaal vali vantha kaala pudunga
mudiyuma?! Illa Thalai Vali Vandha, Thaliathan Pudunga Mudiyuma?

jokes.name: Sunil
jokes.joke:
Naaikku naalu kaal irukkalaam. Aana adhala LOCAL call, STD call, ISD call,
even MISSED call kooda panna mudiyathu!
